channel.title: Work & other Flows
channel.description: Recent content on Work & other Flows

item.title: Spring I/0 2024 Recap
item.description: Today, I feel the Spring I/O conference blues! The weather is getting a bit colder, but the runway is still heated from the sun, and I feel similarly about Spring I/O. I still feel the warmth from all the good conversations and interactions I had and am inspired by the presentations I watched. Now I am back in Berlin at one of my favorite spots, reflecting on the great conference from two weeks ago.
